idea: It is a service which will help the consumer to save the expense of medicine, health check up and doctors consultation charges and other blood test in advance by using this card.This service will be very helpful for consumer in emergency situations if happen and also day to day Or monthly expenses.Nowadays medicine are required in every family and every members. Chronic disease such as diabetes, hypertension, pancreatic, HIV will get covered. Even pregnancy and child vaccination expenses can be save in advance. In this monthly consumer will keep some money min 500 rupee to max 20000  rupee as much as consumer want to save. This card will work in every medical store, health check lab, doctor clinic and also hospital. It will be one less thing to worry in life. By this service, live patients data about brand of medicine use by him / her, type of disease, and prescribed by doctor can be found which can be used in clinical research  and pattern of brand of medicine in that area can be seen.
name: Unique health medicine card

name: Rohan Patnaik

idea:
Our mission is to help our customers to maximize the benefits of technology, supporting their IT, to obtain maximum efficiency and competitiveness in their business. Tamiser is focused on Professional and Managed Services, including: Consulting, Architecture & Process Design, Software Development, Capacity Planning, Performance Analysis, Migration, Continued Support, Management of environments and IT applications & infrastructure , both on-premises and in Cloud Computing .
​
We provide a complete portfolio of cloud services and solutions to transform your business. Use all the potential of cloud computing supported by our expertise. Join hands with us and explore the transformative journey of how Cloud technologies can change your business.
​
From planning to effective migration and subsequent maintenance, count on our team's intelligence and expertise, whose services and solutions provide a complete and transformative cloud computing experience for your company.
​
​Our  services team has the experience and expertise to help your business meet your goals and objectives faster, with less risk.  We assist our customers in achieving their business objectives with the use of technology.

​
Whether you are looking at Cloud Migration, Application Modernization, Software Development, Virtualization, Infrastructure Management, Staffing or other IT services, or just want to better understand your current environment, Tamiser can provide the expertise to help you build a strategy that is right for you.
name: TAMISER ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. idea: Fusion of Data and Management Science. Engaged in creating Management Business Models for Micro Small and Medium Enterprises segment. Only Corporates have sustainable access to highly paid talent and resource;MSME’s are dependent on scattered knowledge of management studies. Using Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence; business management models can be converted to self-executing algorithms which can guide MSME to achieve higher profits, better decision power and thereby higher market shares.
